text: Taylor Swift OWNED The # CapitalJBB Stage & Brought All Her Biggest Hits For This Iconic Performance She certainly lived up to her reputation! She's one of the world's most loved performers and Taylor Swift brought all her style and sass to Capital's Jingle Bell Ball with Coca Cola as she opened the second night of the UK's biggest Christmas party. Backed by her trusty dance crew, Taylor was welcomed onto the stage by the loudest cheer from the 16, 000 screaming fans and it made for one heck of an opening! > AAA Pass At The Ready? Your First Look Backstage At The Jingle Bell Ball 2017 Bursting straight into hits like'Ready For It?'and'Blank Space ', Tay showcased exactly why she '
